page.title: 07Transport 3
page.content:
{Buses}
One of the main problems with this area is the lack of local public transport.
A very good service from the railway station to London is spoilt by the lack of a bus service to and from these stations.
Bus services from Leatherhead are restricted to one an hour to Kingston with a similar service to Epsom. Although Chessington Zoo has a very good service ( about every 10 min. at the peak) these do not go South except for four buses a day so that people in Malden Rushet have to rely on their own transport.
